title: Trying to identify this popular "classic car" type font!
content:
Hello, I am trying to re-create a raster logo for a customer into a scalable format and I am trying to identify a font in which I feel I've seen before but I cannot place it. It is very similar to Harlow Solid Italic. Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks!

Aaron
author: air_run

comments.content:
Thank you Jan. Even after several months, you have saved me once again.

Aaron
